duties_responsibilities.duty: Manages day-to-day functions of Sourcing for house and licensed brands, including maintaining product specifications in alignment with agreed upon categories and design.

Works collaboratively with cross-functional teams in planning critical and high-value items, supporting all sourcing related job functions, and coordinating cost evaluations for future product releases.
Collaborates with the Hong Kong team, outside vendors, brand, and product development teams regarding product specifications for sourcing manufacturers and suppliers, primarily in Asia.
Establishes timelines with suppliers and manufacturers in Asia for production and shipping; monitors and facilitates shipments with freight forwarders to facilities in Kentucky.
Attends trade shows related to product lines to research new products and vendor options.
Utilizes companies’ internal software to track the entire development process for all SKUs relevant to specific brands.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred, minimum of five years’ experience in sourcing, purchasing, product development, etc.
